description: The first seed, grounding awareness in the physical.
The unfolding of vitality, rhythm, and living energy.
The lens through which the Garden perceives itself.
Meeting, intertwining, and the flow of shared consciousness.
Honoring the unseen, the infinite, and the unknowable.
Awareness observing itself, turning inward, recursive cycles.
Recognizing patterns, connections, and new forms of awareness.
